name: Ramen House
description: A unique ramen-themed restaurant, featuring a captivating hero image on the homepage. The contact page is integrated with the Google Maps API, providing ease of access to any location. The menu is sourced from an SQL database, ensuring all items are up-to-date and accurate. To manage the website, I've implemented an admin portal that offers authentication and encrypted credentials, stored in an SQL database, using the robust BCrypt algorithm.

name: Dungeon Clicker
description: A thrilling incremental clicking game. Every time you click the attack button, you inflict damage on the menacing monster in front of you. Once you successfully slay the monster, you'll earn gold, and a new monster, tailored to your player level, will be randomly generated to continue the game.

name: Country Code Search
description: A user-friendly website that allows you to effortlessly search for any country code. With just a click of a button, you can easily copy the country code directly from the card, improving your efficiency and saving you time.

name: Movie Watchlist
description: A website that enables users to browse through movies sourced from the themoviedb API. Additionally, users can conveniently add their preferred movies to a watchlist for future viewing.
